name: progress-tracker
description: Track long-running AI agent tasks with feature-based progress tracking, test-driven status updates, Git integration, and prog-ui web dashboard

commands.name: prog-done
commands.description: Complete and commit the current feature after testing

commands.name: prog-fix
commands.description: Report, list, or fix bugs with smart scheduling and systematic debugging

commands.name: prog-init
commands.description: Initialize project progress tracking with feature breakdown

commands.name: prog-next
commands.description: Start implementing the next pending feature

commands.name: prog-plan
commands.description: Create architectural plan with technology selection and system design

commands.name: prog-reset
commands.description: Reset progress tracking by deleting all tracking files

commands.name: prog-ui
commands.description: Launch Progress UI web server and open browser

commands.name: prog-start
commands.description: Start active feature development from planning stage

commands.name: prog-sync
commands.description: Sync project capability memory from git history with batch confirmation

commands.name: prog-undo
commands.description: Undo the last completed feature and revert its code changes
